nodes.name: Tamacoinchi

attributes.name: Tamacoinchi

devdoc.author: Enis Tola
devdoc.details: Tamacoinchi is a smart contract that allows users to raise their own cute virtual pet. Every transaction is written on the Ethereum blockchain. Feed, pet and raise your new best friend. But be careful: if you're pet starves to death, you have to ask a friend to revive it!
devdoc.title: Tamacoinchi smart contract, displaying how raising a virtual pet on the blockchain could look like
